ch0312_00_hinatsu/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You’re full of energy today!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/0101_0701_02_10:
Do you like your hairstyle? If not, I can get it
just right!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7101_0701_01_10:
Back in Hisui, I was burnin’ the candle at
both ends as both a Diamond Clan warden
and a hairdresser!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7101_0701_02_10:
I’m gonna keep learning about hairstyling
on Pasio—and become a bold and stylish
sync pair!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7102_0701_01_10:
In Hisui, there are Pokémon called
“the nobles.”
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7102_0701_02_10:
They’re descendants of special Pokémon that
were blessed by almighty Sinnoh.
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7102_0701_03_10:
It’s an honor to be asked to care for such
Pokémon!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7103_0701_01_10:
In Jubilife Village, a lot of my customers got
their photos taken after I did their hair—and
that seems to be the case on Pasio, too!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7103_0701_02_10:
When your hair’s looking pretty perfect,
it makes sense to want to capture it.
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7103_0701_03_10:
I better roll up my sleeves and do some
bold and stylish hairstyles!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7104_0701_01_10:
The Team Galactic of this era seems different
from the Galaxy Expedition Team I know.
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7104_0701_02_10:
Their hairstyles really are...dare I say...
cutting edge!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7105_0701_01_10:
When you have a lot of responsibilities,
it’s easy to feel you need to figure out
everything on your own.
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7105_0701_02_10:
There was a time I felt that way and caused
everyone a lot of trouble.
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7105_0701_03_10:
That’s when I realized how important it is to
talk to and rely on others.
ch0312_00_hinatsu/7105_0701_04_10:
If something’s ever troubling you,
be sure to rely on those around you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, good timing! Here, take this!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s my way of thanks for always giving me
new hairstyle ideas!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2501_0701_01_10: This era has so many different hairstyles.
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2501_0701_02_10:
Each is so unique. I love it! They’re giving
me tons of ideas for new ones of my own!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2501_0702_01_10: If it’s cool with you, could I style your hair?
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2501_0702_02_10: I just came up with a new look!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2501_0702_03_10: Don’t worry—your hair will be perfect!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2511_0701_01_10:
At first, I was a little hesitant to put my
Pokémon in a Poké Ball.
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2511_0701_02_10:
But now I see it as a new relationship
between people and Pokémon.
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2511_0701_03_10:
I have my dependable leader to thank
for that!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2511_0702_01_10:
I gotta talk to my Pokémon more so we can
understand each other better.
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s what it means to be a “Trainer,”
right?
ch0312_00_hinatsu/2511_0702_03_10:
Then I’ll become a Trainer who packs
a punch!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Feeling lost on how to style your
hair today? Leave it to me!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/3003_0701_01_10:
Seeing all the different hairstyles on Pasio
gives me so many ideas!
ch0312_00_hinatsu/3005_0701_01_10:
Quiet nights back in Hisui were nice, but so
are the lively and vibrant nights of this era.
